meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the February 14, 2024 City Council Meeting
An ordinance amending ordinance No. 27485
agenda_items.description: An ordinance granting a franchise to Oncor Electric Delivery Company LLC, by extending the term and providing for its renewal with minor modifications - Estimated Annual Revenue: General Fund $50,000,000

agenda_items.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32554
agenda_items.description: Authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2023-24 for the maintenance and operation of various departments, activities, and amending the capital budget; and authorize the City Manager to implement those adjustments - Not to exceed $4,898,376,958

agenda_items.title: Authorize rescinding the Community Development Block Grant Contract
agenda_items.description: Public Facility Improvements Project contract awarded to City Square Arts Opportunity Center, LLC, previously approved on January 21, 2021, to complete public facility improvements to the Forest Theater located at 1918 Martin Luther King Jr. Boulevard; and the funds to be reprogrammed for other eligible uses during the development of the FY 2024-25 Community Development Block Grant

agenda_items.title: Authorize initial support of the approach for development of the new 5-Year Consolidated Plan
agenda_items.description: Covering the period of FY 2024-25 through FY 2028-29 for the four U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development grant funds

agenda_items.title: Authorize public hearings to be held
agenda_items.description: To receive comments on the FY 2024-25 Operating, Capital, and Grant & Trust Budgets

agenda_items.title: Authorize partial settlement of the lawsuit styled Ignacio Cuevas and Rita Cuevas
Authorize partial settlement of the lawsuit styled Vicki Timpa
Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Timothy Shearer
Authorize the annual adoption of the City’s Investment Policy
agenda_items.description: Investment strategies regarding funds under the City’s control and management

financial_items.description: Estimated Annual Revenue from Oncor Electric Delivery Company LLC franchise
Not to exceed amount for various departments and activities
Total settlement for Ignacio Cuevas and Rita Cuevas lawsuit
Total settlement for Vicki Timpa lawsuit
Total settlement for Timothy Shearer lawsuit
